caption:
👏🏾 Meet @UrFriendCharles, the ultimate destination to discover and shop Black-owned liquor, wine, beer, and zero-proof brands, all in one place. Founded by content creator Charles Everett, UrFriendCharles.com is now the largest platform of its kind, shipping to 44 states.⁠
⁠
Whether you’re stocking your bar or shopping for gifts, the platform makes it easy to #BuyBlack with intention — and filters let you search by women-owned, HBCU-founded, Divine 9, Caribbean-owned, LGBTQ+, veteran-owned, and more.⁠
⁠
Explore curated collections, founder stories, and AI-powered product matchmaking, all built to spotlight Black-owned excellence in the beverage space.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
.⁠
